name: ASSOCIACION ECOCIDIO DEL RIO AGUAS
membership: Aqiferos Vivos - Collection of platforms protecting water in Almeria Province
goal:
Article 6. Purposes.

The purposes of the Association will be the following:

- The defense of the Aguas River, the Aquas Aquifer (060.008) and the protected areas in its area of ​​influence (Karst in Sorbas gypsum (ES6110002) - Sierra Cabrera and Bédar (ES6110005) mainly.
- Protect the human and environmental values ​​dependent on the water body 060.008, especially in the Sorbas-Tabernas region (Almería).
- Promote the sustainable use of water in the aforementioned region.
- Knowledge and study of the water situation including the radioactive contamination of the mentioned region.
- Publicize and publicize the problem of the aquifer 006.008 in all the opportune forums.
- Cooperation with other citizen movements and associations that have similar purposes.

And for its achievement the following activities will be developed:

-To raise funds for activities carried out to protect human and environmental values ​​in the body of water 060.008
- Relationship with administrations and public and private entities with responsibilities in water policy.
- Participation in forums and conferences on water.
- Publicize and publicize the problem of aquifer 006.008 in all the opportune forums and social networks.
- Undertake legal actions deemed appropriate in defense of a common good such as water in these semiarid landscapes.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Communication, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights
